doc.title: 'Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty' - Making of the Hollywood Game
doc.plot: This made-for-DVD documentary treats action game fans to a behind-the-scenes look at the making of Metal Gear Solid 2, the Konami game about a special forces agent sent to infiltrate a secret enemy base and rescue the president. Features interviews with game director Hideo Kojima, as well as other members of the cast and crew, who share their experiences from working on the project, as well as discuss the special efforts that were needed and the delays and setbacks that were faced as they brought it all together.
